scripts.postupdate-dependencies: echo 'If @fontsource got updated, download the .ttf files online and convert them to Base64.'
scripts.reinstall-dependencies: rd /s /q node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.db:first-initialization: npm run db:start && npx supabase db pull && npx supabase migration up && npm run db:reset && npm run db:generate-types
scripts.db:generate-types: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > src/types/database.types.ts
scripts.db:generate-types-and-zod: npm run db:generate-types && npx tsx ./scripts/schema-generator.ts && npx tsx ./scripts/post-schema-generator.ts
scripts.db:dump: npx supabase db dump --data-only --schema public --file supabase/seed.sql
scripts.db:reset: npx supabase db reset && npm run db:generate-types-and-zod
scripts.db:dump-reset: npm run db:dump && npm run db:reset
